revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: An essay on field fortification intended principally for the use of officers of infantry. Shewing how to trace out on the ground, and construct ... all sorts of redo..."
revision.text: Possibly: An essay on field fortification intended principally for the use of officers of infantry. Shewing how to trace out on the ground, and construct ... all sorts of redouts and other field works; ... Translated from the original manuscript of an officer of experience in the Prussian service, by J. C. Pleydell, ... (London : printed for J. Nourse, 1768). http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/938349847
